algorithm_technique: Precompute words per line, then simulate row by row using modulo arithmetic.
problem_summary_simple: Fit a sentence onto a screen of given dimensions, counting how many times it can be fully displayed.
problem_summary_technical: Greedily determine how many words fit on each line, then use modulo arithmetic to track sentence progress across rows.
key_insights: Pre-calculating how many words fit on a single line starting from each word optimizes repeated calculations.
Modulo arithmetic is key to efficiently cycling through the sentence words.
The time complexity is dominated by the initial precomputation and then iterating through rows.
